name: Necklace Wishbones - Skateboard Jewellery Gold
description:
These sweet little pieces are a new addition to our Deadwood Creative range. We make them using the offcuts of our other skateboard jewellery pieces, making use of as much of each broken skateboard as possible.

Each Wishbone Necklace is a one of a kind, as each piece used is a shard or offcut of other pieces. The skateboard shard pieces range in size from 2cm - 5cm (approx), and hang together in a cluster of 7 Bones.

Threaded onto a beautiful smooth woven silk thread and finished with (recycled) sterling silver beads, the necklaces are designed to slip over your head with an adjustable bead to make hang any length from choker to approx 55cm long.

This listing is for one of the necklaces pictured, choose based on drop down menu below. If you are wanting a particular colour please contact us, and we can see what colour options we have available to make for you. We do love custom orders!

Made by Sam Messina & Ellie Beck for Deadwood Creative, in our forest studio in Northern NSW, Australia

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. If you don't have a PayPal account, don't worry - you can make a payment using your credit card. It will process via the PayPal page, but will come from your credit card. You do not need to set up a PayPal account. If you would like to make a payment via direct deposit into our Australian bank account, please send us an email and we can let you know the bank details. Please contact us if you have any queries about PayPal or how to make a payment via our webstore.

name: Skateboard Bracelet
description:
These bracelets are made using broken skateboard decks, that were destined for the bin! Cut, sanded and then finished by hand, these pieces are one-of-a-kind art works to wear on your body. The scratched up boards and original graphics make each piece unique.

The colours of each board differ depending on the brand and design of each skate company. Most skateboards are made from 7ply of Canadian Maple, and the rainbow colours are the way they're made!

Our bracelets are cut to different sizes, to suit different wrist sizes. If you require assistance with sizing of your bracelet, please contact us. We have a regular (inside diameter is approx 65mm) and a large (inside diameter is approx 72mm).

We sell our bracelets based on the plain block colour on one side. The other side generally has scratched up images from the graphics on the skateboard. Please choose what main colour you would like, and we will select the backing images for you. It's a wonderful lucky dip! 

If the colour you want is listed as out of stock, please contact us as we may have some more or can custom cut a colour for you.

The bracelets come in their own stitched paper bags, with care instructions. 

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. If you don't have a PayPal account, don't worry - you can make a payment using your credit card. It will process via the PayPal page, but will come from your credit card. You do not need to set up a PayPal account. If you would like to make a payment via direct deposit into our Australian bank account, please send us an email and we can let you know the bank details. Please contact us if you have any queries about PayPal or how to make a payment via our webstore.

name: Belt Buckle Recycled SkateBoard
description:
Using off cuts from our bracelets these belt buckles are the perfect way to wear a one-off piece of artwork. Match your belt to your bracelet! Great for men or women.

Approx 60mm x 50mm in size (some a little smaller), these are lightweight buckles with a clip on the back to attach to a 38mm blank belt. 

Handcrafted by Sam Messina in our forest studio in Northern NSW, Australia.

The belt buckles come in their own stitched paper bags (we make them out of recycled skate magazines), with care instructions.

COLOUR OPTIONS:
#1 pink zip - top image, top row, on left
#2 black white - top image, top row, middle
#3 grey red stripe - top image, top row, on right
#4 anti hero - top image, bottom row, on left
#5 yellow spot green - top image, bottom row, middle
#6 Element brand logo tree - top image, bottom row, on right
#7 Green scratch - second image, top row, on left
#8 Black white - second image, top row, middle
#9 green cloud - second image, top row, on right
#10 lines yellow black - second image, bottom row, on left
#11 green on green - second image, bottom row, middle
#12 white scratch - second image, bottom row, on right

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. name: Skateboard Bead Necklace Allsorts
description:
These fabulous bead necklaces look like round licorice allsorts, with their 7 layers of rainbow colour. 

Each bead is cut, sanded and then finished by hand. Made using off-cuts from our stacks of broken skateboards; the beads measure approx 2cm diameter. Each necklace features 5 beads (custom orders of more beads available by request) in a unique set of colours, no two are arranged in the same way. 

Your necklace will be like the ones pictured - but each one is slightly different. They all come in a beautiful assortment of Licorice Allsorts Rainbow colours. Please specify in notes to seller what colour combinations you'd like.

Available on antique brass chain 50cm (approx) in length, or black waxed cotton cord with an adjustable bead clasp making it form choker length to 55cm long.

Made from broken skateboard decks that were destined for the rubbish. Skateboards are made from a Canadian Hardrock Maple ply; with each company using different coloured layers for different designs. The beads are coated using a clear-coat of VOC-free sealer, to keep the colour bright and cheery. 

They come packaged in a stitched paper pouch, perfect for gifting or to treasure for yourself. 

Made by Hand by Sam Messina for Deadwood Creative in our forest studio, in Northern NSW, Australia. 

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. If you don't have a PayPal account, don't worry - you can make a payment using your credit card. It will process via the PayPal page, but will come from your credit card. You do not need to set up a PayPal account. If you would like to make a payment via direct deposit into our Australian bank account, please send us an email and we can let you know the bank details. Please contact us if you have any queries about PayPal or how to make a payment via our webstore.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Can't decide what your friend would like best? We get that!

Due to requests we have launched our new Deadwood Creative Gift Voucher, available in denominations of your choice starting at $25. All vouchers over $50 value receive a FREE skateboard keyring. 

These vouchers come in one of our beautiful stitched paper bags, that we make from recycled skateboard magazines, and hand lettered hello to your friend or loved one. Leave a message in the notes to seller and we'll add a little gift tag as well. 

Vouchers have a 1 year expiry date from date of purchase.

name: Ear-rings Skateboard Bead Silver Drop
description:
These beautiful and distinct Deadwood Creative ear-rings are made using the offcuts of our broken skateboard decks. Cut from the scraps of other pieces, they match with our bracelets in a non-matchy way!
Each ear-ring is a piece of art, showing off the graphics and scratch marks of the tricks from the skateboard's previous life on the streets. 

Hand formed recycled sterling silver ear wires create a stunning and elegant look, finished with a silver bead and flattened end. The skateboard beads measure approx 2cm in diameter and twist on the ear wires to show off both sides of the colours. They hang approx 7cm long.

Handcrafted by Sam Messina in our forest studio in Northern NSW, Australia.

The ear-rings come in their own stitched paper bags, with care instructions.

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. If you don't have a PayPal account, don't worry - you can make a payment using your credit card. It will process via the PayPal page, but will come from your credit card. You do not need to set up a PayPal account. If you would like to make a payment via direct deposit into our Australian bank account, please send us an email and we can let you know the bank details. Please contact us if you have any queries about PayPal or how to make a payment via our webstore.

COLOUR OPTIONS AVAILABLE:
Top Row: left - right: Green #1, Natural #2, Black #3, Red #4
Bottom Row: left - right: Purple #5, Pink #6, Blue #7, Brown #8
If the colour you want is listed as out of stock, please contact us as we may have some more.

name: Double-Triangle Necklace Skateboard on Silk Cord w' Silver
description:
Made from offcuts of broken skateboard decks, these necklaces are hand shaped and sanded to Triangle perfection. Each one is slightly different in size and shape, as well as the colours. This unusual method of sanding away the layers shows off the skateboards at their best - high-lighting the colours and different ply.

Two complementary triangles hang together in a most pleasing way, strung on a woven silk cord and finished with recycled sterling silver beads. The necklace slips over your neck and can be adjusted with the slider bead from a choker to approx 60cm long. Two little silver beads and tassels hang at the knotted tail ends. 

Each piece is crafted by hand and finished with a VOC-free coating to bring out the shine and protect your necklace from everyday wear.

Comes with a recycled paper pouch, stitched by us, and care instructions.

COLOURS AVAILABLE :
Green & Pink Rainbow on black cord #1
Green & Blue on blue cord #2
Pink & Pink Rainbow on purple cord #3


Handcrafted by Sam Messina in our forest studio in Northern NSW, Australia.

PAYMENT OPTIONS - Our webstore is set up to take payment via PayPal. Once you finish the checkout process you'll be automatically directed to PayPal to make your payment. If you don't have a PayPal account, don't worry - you can make a payment using your credit card. It will process via the PayPal page, but will come from your credit card. You do not need to set up a PayPal account. If you would like to make a payment via direct deposit into our Australian bank account, please send us an email and we can let you know the bank details. description:

This unusual method of sanding away the layers shows off the skateboards at their best - hi-lighting the colours and different ply.

Each piece is crafted by hand and finished with a VOC-free coating to bring out the shine and protect your necklace from everyday wear.

Comes with a recycled paper pouch, stitched by us, and care instructions.
